forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of fog early, becoming sunny this afternoon. High 62F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Areas of patchy fog. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Areas of patchy fog. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 48F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High around 60F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
